meanings.definition: A pad of paper for sketching or drawing.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my sketchpad to draw in art class.
meanings.sent2: She filled her sketchpad with colorful drawings of flowers.
meanings.sent3: The sketchpad was so full of doodles, it looked like a rainbow exploded on it.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a sketchpad, capturing every detail of the bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out sketchpad held memories of countless creative moments.

meanings.definition: A digital device or application used for creating sketches or drawings.
meanings.sent1: He used a digital sketchpad to design logos for his clients.
meanings.sent2: The artist preferred using a sketchpad for digital illustrations.
meanings.sent3: The digital sketchpad made drawing feel like magic at his fingertips.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity soared as she explored the endless possibilities of the sketchpad.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the sketchpad made creating art a futuristic experience.
